title: Age of Empires IV – Patch 13.2.4553
description: Hello once again, Age of Empires IV fans! We’re back at it with another Season Ten patch that we’re excited to roll out. We appreciate your feedback and requests tremendously and are squashing a few pesky bugs that made their way into our latest patches. Plus, we’re rolling out our newest Seasonal Event, so read … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Update 144358
description: Today’s patch is aimed at addressing small stability and performance issues, plus bug fixes, and localization adjustments. Be sure to dig down into the post below to get all of the smaller details before hopping in-game and checking them out firsthand. Thanks again to our amazing community members, all of whom have helped to make Age … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Update 143421
description: Welcome to another exciting update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – including fixes for medals and Rocket Carts, plus the newest DLC, The Three Kingdoms, is officially available on Steam, Microsoft Store, Xbox, and PlayStation 5! Thanks again to our amazing community members, all of whom have helped to make Age of Empires what it is … Continued

title: Available Now: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition on PlayStation 5!
description: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition celebrates the 25th anniversary of one of the most popular strategy games ever, and is now available on PlayStation 5! Explore all the original Campaigns alongside best-selling expansions like never before. With over 200 hours of gameplay and 1,000 years of human history, your definitive Age of Empires II … Continued

title: New DLC Available Now – The Three Kingdoms
description: Dive into China’s epic, The Three Kingdoms, where history and legend collide in a battle for supremacy – available now on Steam, Microsoft Store, Xbox, and PlayStation 5! The Three Kingdoms introduces five fascinating new civilizations, each with their own unique units and technologies: the Shu, Wei, and Wu, who represent the legendary Three Kingdoms; … Continued
